codexes.title: SATELLITES_Hack
codexes.text:
ERROR CONNECTING:192.168.38.92: www47 connectToServerPort:socket/socket timed out at /home/ script/MPfetchData.pl line 342,

A.S.P. exists to control. That's one way to sea it. But their real goal is to capture: Thought. Emotions. DNA.

They say they want to awaken human intuition. They're lying.

<SOCK_192.168.38.92>chunk 288809.

Copycat _-_-_

Just like the First Civ, they want to keep their knowledge to themselves.

E.

codexes.title: MILES' FOLLY_Hack
codexes.text:
ComStatic [005643217] C SH/Tone

Miles can't stop them. Whatever he does, whatever secret he kept for himself, won't work. It's a battle that's been raging for millennia. Miles' actions are not a means to an end.

S0202: 02:11:32 Reboot NT machine clsnetnt07 cabinet 645R 13/1CMP:CRITICAL:

Little Bill's flying solo again. Will he crash? Will his "Brothers" come to his rescue?

E.

VICTIMS
codexes.text:
ERROR CONNECTING:192.168.38.92 : www56 connectToServerPort:socket/socket timed out at /home/ script/MPfetchData.pl line678,

codexes.title: INTRO_Hack
codexes.text:
INTERNAL ABSTERGO MEMORANDUM

IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED

Security Fail. Critical communication leak. Network compromised.

Unacceptable.

These files need to be secured and moved from public view.

I don't know what they're doing there anyway. They should be classified TS/SCI.

This project of yours is nothing but trouble! Fix this before Launch.

A.R.

Don't worry, they won't fix it.

This is a lot of noise from the grapevine. Don't know what's true, what's false… but they are talking. Let me help you make it clearer.

Just listen.

The sleeper is awakening.

codexes.title: RECIPE_Hack
codexes.text:
UAL 41.63 -0.74 DAL 39.21 -0.34 U 11.02 -0.27 AMR 27.72 -0.35

Rice or corn flour. Mix with salt and water. Cook until thickened. Wrap mixture in green banana leaves. Add coconut milk and sugar.

|***Server Alert*** Alert Type: PROBLEM Service: CheckHTTP Host: ComStatic Main Address: 222.18.192.121 State: CRITICAL

It's an acaca recip—the main ritualistic food of the candoble religion of Brazil.

E.

codexes.title: INTRO
codexes.text:
INTERNAL ABSTERGO MEMORANDUM

IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED

Security Fail. Critical communication leak. Network compromised.

Unacceptable.

These files need to be secured, encrypted and remove from public view.

I don't know what they're doing there anyway. They should be classified TS/SCI.

This project of yours is nothing but trouble! Fix this before Launch.

A.R.

Schmidt is dead. Peake is gone.

Otto Schmidt was a member of the Inner Sanctum. Anson Peake was the spokesperson for Abstergo's Project Legacy.

How did Schmidt die?

Is Peake really gone? Or hooked into the machine?

codexes.title: ROANOKE_Hack
codexes.text:
D ALPHA frm: ServersA@COMSTAT.com sub: clust-DB DOWN Txt: cluster-DB DOWN Mail

What if they run simulations to see if we were here before? What if an Assassins' Colony had ever existed? What if they discovered that we were the model for their Utopia?

1/128/181-254 TU 8466/751/670-043 PG4526/3880/006+032 4141/4130/4060/3071

PGO 3597/6271-0697 PL v6530/g6544 +007 FN_700/_5380+0370 Pam67800+001

Where they here before the Templars? Remember Roanoke? Is it them who guided the colony into the wild?

codexes.title: THE PROPHET_Hack
codexes.text:
Test Message #92-IX_T1076

Cross killed the Mentor in 00. He initiated the Purge. But he didn't stop there. He uncovered the writings of the Prophet, hidden in Moscow, inside the secret library of Ivan the Terrible. Then he assassinated the last guardian.

They've been tracking Desmond since 02. We should have used Miles as a red herring.

ComStatic Down Server [2] - 1 Server [3] - 0 Primary -2 tms_msg[000]

dev_err[333]

Ah… The Assassin Order of Brothery Love…

Ask not what your Brotherhood can do for you…

They will do it anyway.

E.
